metadata.name: WMI Persistence - Script Event Consumer File Write
metadata.comment: Detects file writes of WMI script event consumer

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\wbem\\scrcons.exe'))

output.summary: Detects file writes of WMI script event consumer

metadata.objective: False positive: Dell Power Manager (C:\Program Files\Dell\PowerManager\DpmPowerPlanSetup.exe) Reference: https://www.eideon.com/2018-03-02-THL03-WMIBackdoors/
